means.word_mean: 1. (Greek mythology) immortal winged horse that sprang from the blood of the slain Medusa; was tamed by Bellerophon with the help of a bridle given him by Athena; as the flying horse of the Muses it is a symbol of high-flying imagination
2. a constellation in the northern hemisphere near Andromeda and Pisces
